title: Cheese Burger
description: Prepared with beef patty, cheese, burger sauce, pickles & onion.

title: Bacon Cheese Burger
description: Prepared with beef patty, 2 slices cheese, bacon & burger sauce

title: Double Cheese Burger
description: Prepared with pan fried chicken breast cooked in creamy garlic mushroom, served with fried rice & sauteed vegetables.

title: Lil Smoke Burger
description: Prepared with ham & cheese stuffed fried chicken breast, served with mashed potato & sauteed vegetable.

title: Big Smoke
description: Prepared with chili, garlic & butter sauteed spicy mushroom.

title: Grilled Chicken Burger
description: Prepared with chicken, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper & apple lettuce tossed with lemon.

title: Seafood Burger
description: Prepared with fettucine tossed in spicy tomato butter sauce with sauteed salmon, prawn & squid.

title: Cheesy Baked Burger
description: Prepared with baked penne pasta in mushroom & chicken topped with mozzarella.

title: Salmon Steak
description: Prepared with grilled salmon steak with fries & sauteed vegetables.

title: Beef Tenderloin Steak
description: Served with sauteed vegetables, pepper sauce & a choice of fried rice or mashed potato.
